sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import { useState } from 'react' import { useEffect } from 'react' import '../../pages/Home/Slideer/Slideer.css' import axios from 'axios' import Sidebar from '../../components/SideBar/Sidebar/Sidebar' import "../slider/Slider.Detail.css" import { NavLink } from 'react-router-dom' const SliderDetail = () => { const [slider , setSlider] = useState([]) const slider_arr = slider && slider.map(item => { return item._id }) console.log(slider_arr) useEffect(() => { axios.get('http://localhost:5000/slider') .then(res => setSlider(res.data.sliders)) .catch(error => console.log(error)) } , []) return (
{slider&&slider.map((sliderss,_id) => ( { await axios.put(`http://localhost:5000/slider/${slider_arr[_id]}`) .then(res => res.data) }} className='me-1'>Update Delete ))}
{sliderss.title.slice(0,20)} {sliderss.description.slice(0,20)}
) } export default SliderDetail
